articles.content:
Republicans on Tuesday blocked an effort by Sen. Chuck Schumer to outlaw gun bump stocks after the Supreme Court overturned a Trump-era ban on the killer devices.

articles.title: Trump-endorsed Navy veteran to face Tim Kaine in Virginia
articles.description: Retired Navy Capt. Hung Cao has won the Senate GOP primary in Virginia, beating out four other Republican rivals.
articles.content:
Retired Navy Capt. Hung Cao has won the Senate GOP primary in Virginia, beating out four other Republican rivals, and will take on incumbent Sen. Tim Kaine (D-VA) in November.
